summary: The customer was frustrated because they had been charged for a TV that they never ordered. The agent apologized for the confusion and reassured the customer that the charge would be removed and refunded. To ensure that this issue doesn't happen again, the agent informed the customer that measures had been taken to improve system processes and review their account history for any other erroneous charges. Additionally, the customer will be sent a monthly statement of their account activity to review for any unauthorized charges. The agent concluded by reassuring the customer that if anything else comes up in the future, they should reach out right away so that it can be resolved quickly.
